author: Microsoft
name: Aspire Python 入门版应用
description: 用于使用 Vite 和 React 结合 Python 后端 API 服务和 JavaScript 前端创建 Aspire 应用的项目模板。
symbols/AzureSubscriptionId/description: The Azure Subscription ID where the Foundry Agent resources will be deployed.
symbols/AzureResourceGroup/description: The Azure Resource Group name where the Foundry Agent resources will be deployed.
symbols/AzureLocation/description: The Azure region where the Foundry Agent will be hosted.
symbols/AgentName/description: The name of the Foundry Agent.
symbols/AddFoundryRandomSuffix/descripti: If true, a random suffix will be added to the Agent name when creating the Foundry resource to ensure global uniqueness.
